meanings.definition: The name assigned to a file in a computer system.
meanings.sent1: I saved the document with the filename 'report.doc'.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include the correct filename when attaching the file to an email.
meanings.sent3: The filename of the picture was so long that it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her filename was like a secret code that only she could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The filename 'important_notes.txt' reminded me of the crucial information within.

meanings.definition: A string of characters that identifies a file stored on a computer.
meanings.sent1: The filename 'image.jpg' was easy to recognize.
meanings.sent2: When downloading a file, always check the filename for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally renamed the filename to 'confused.doc'.
meanings.sent4: The filename acted as a key to unlock the contents of the file.
meanings.sent5: The filename 'top_secret.pdf' hinted at classified information within.
